item.title: Emacs on Macos Monterey
item.description: Intro Got a new computer from work, this is some quick notes on how my Emacs setup looks. Run Emacs as daemon with LaunchAgent. Fetch mails periodically with mbsync via LaunchAgent. Install brew install --cask emacs brew install mu brew install isync brew install gpg brew ls --verbose emacs brew ls --verbose mu Mu4a mkdir -p ~/.mail/work ~/.mail/gmail mu init --maildir=~/.mail --my-address=USERNAME@gmail.com --my-address=USERNAME@work.com mu index mbsync -Va mu index Mbsync config cat ~/.
